EmailTemplate.name: Aditya Webinar reachout
EmailTemplate.subject: Coursera can help {!Account.Name} keep pace with emerging tech!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for attending the webinar “A Corporate Learning Revolution” hosted by SHRM in partnership with Coursera.
Here’s a link to the recording in case you missed out or wish to revisit some parts of the talk.
I would love to understand how {!Lead.Company} is using eLearning and MOOCs in its overall learning and development strategy. Are you actively looking at moving from an In-classroom training to eLearning? Or looking to supplement your existing learning programs with eLearning and mobile learning?
Would you or someone from your team have time for a quick call next week?
Best regards, Aditya Shailaj Enterprise Account Executive Coursera
